item.description: [...] Victoria British Columbia Blog wrote an interesting post today onHere’s a quick excerpt25 APR’08, VANCOUVER–British Columbia has slapped an official moratorium on uranium exploration and development in the province, reinforcing a long-standing informal ban on the nuclear fuel and dashing the hopes of companies that hoped … [...]
